skMSXMLElement Class Reference

This class is used to create additional XML elements that are added to an XML document, it overrides Element from the Microsoft XML parser library. More...

#include <skMSXMLElement.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 skXMLElement (XMLElement &owner, const skString &tagname)
 Constructor - passes an owner and a tagname.

Detailed Description

This class is used to create additional XML elements that are added to an XML document, it overrides Element from the Microsoft XML parser library.
